Text:
check out my other torrent for his previous album

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5019630/Steve_Burns_-_Songs_For_Dustmites_%5B2003%5D

You sir, are a sexy, sexy god. Or Goddess.

Either way, Steve Burns is one of the best mellow, alternative artists I've heard in a long time, and I've been dying for the new album!! I didn't even know it was out. As long as it doesn't blow goats, I shall purchase it tomorrow!
